oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni recites a prayer to the young moon. The people pray to the moon so that they may find food and eat. 1) p.9435v: !nanni heard this from his father, 2) See also Young moon's story, 3) The |xam also pray to the moon for food (see Prayers to the moon, from the |xam Book II-1), 4) This story is found in Book XI & XII-6.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prayer to the young moon
